pageContext.claim: “And for the first time ever, really -- and we have a lot of great programs to help -- for the first time ever, employers are hiring prisoners. They're getting a second and, in some cases, a third chance.”
pageContext.analysis: Programs to help support people getting out of prison to find jobs are nothing new and the Trump administration did not invent the idea. One program, CEO works, has been doing this for more than 30 years.
